datanetwork.javaosc
Class OSCPortOut

java.lang.Object
  datanetwork.javaosc.OSCPort
      datanetwork.javaosc.OSCPortOut

public class OSCPortOut
extends OSCPort

Connects to the SenseWorldDataNetwork server's listening port and allows to send it OSCMessage.

Part of Sense/Stage

Based on Java OSC. Copyright (C) 2003-2006, C. Ramakrishnan / Illposed Software. All rights reserved.

Field Detail

address

protected java.net.InetAddress address
Constructor Detail

OSCPortOut

public OSCPortOut(java.lang.String address,
                  int port)
Attempts to connect to the server at the specified IP. Creates a socket through which to connect to the server and sets the outgoing communication port.

Parameters:
address - the server's IP address as a String.
port - the port to which send the OSCMessage.
Method Detail

send

public void send(OSCPacket message)
Sends OSCMessage to the server.

Parameters:
message - the OSCMessage to send.

close

public void close()
Closes the socket used to connect to the server.

close in class OSCPort
